p.d: The Cévennes Despite snow and freezing temperatures, Émilie Broussouloux takes us to explore the Aigoual, in the Cévennes, to the south of the Massif Central. On the programme: a visit to the Mont Aigoual weather station, still inhabited, an encounter with tree-lovers, the manufacture of silk stockings and mohair wool production. Presented by: Émilie Broussouloux.
